itunes:title: Getting Tampons Thrown At You On Stage (WATERPARKS, Awsten Knight)
title: Getting Tampons Thrown At You On Stage (WATERPARKS, Awsten Knight)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Awsten Knight of the pop punk band WATERPARKS graces the Lightweights Podcast as we talk about having tampons be thrown at you on stage, partying hard as a rockstar, falling while crowd surfing, and being manages by Good Charlotte.

Check out Awsten on instagram @awstenknight @waterparks

follow us on Instagram @lightweightspod // @ilyafeddy // @ughitsjoe
